name: When The Bell Tolls
summary:
在寒冷而又黑暗的万圣节之夜！
伊莲女士和她的车夫杰姆斯先生，
正在回家的漫长旅途中，然而却发生无法置信之事！

When The Bell Tolls is a short (roughly 30min of gameplay) Adventure/Puzzle game.

On Halloween night Lady Elaine travels home when suddenly her carriage stops and she finds herself lost in a cursed forest haunted by deadly ghosts. Abandoned by her driver and joined by a new friend, she must try to break the Curse of Crook before sunrise or she too will become a ghost.

Explore dungeons and solve puzzles while racing against the clock to save Lady Elaine from an evil fate.
